summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges incurred, including transportation and handling fees, and provides payment instructions. The invoice indicates a total amount due of $30.85, with a payment deadline of July 6, 2004.

The total amount due on the invoice is $30.85, with a payment deadline of July 6, 2004.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge and a discount applied to the total charges.
The document references multiple addresses associated with Jeffrey Epstein.
There is a mention of a shipment picked up on June 10, 2004, and delivered on June 14, 2004.
